Why You’ll Love It:

  • Gentle Cleanse: Removes buildup without harsh sulfates.

  • Moisturizes + Protects: Keeps hair hydrated and nourished after every wash.

  • Preserves Natural Patterns: Designed to maintain the look and feel of textured hair.

  • Healthy Scalp Care: Helps reduce dryness for stronger, healthier hair.

SULFATE-FREE? SAY LESS.

Formulated without sulfates and silicones that dry out your hair.

For best use

Daily/Weekly AM or PM; you decide. Apply to warm wet hair, massaging hair and scalp. Rinse well with warm water. Follow with BEVEL Moisturizing Sulfate-Free Conditioner.

KEY INGREDIENTS

  • Coconut Oil - A natural oil that helps prevent the loss of protein and vital moisture from your hair.
  • Shea Butter - Helps stop dryness by locking in moisture and provides shine without being greasy.

MADE WITHOUT

Sulfates, Silicones, Parabens, Phthalates, Artificial Dyes, EDTA.

Full Ingredients

Water, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Fragrance, Panthenol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyquaternium-10, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Salicylic Acid, Polyquaternium-7, Histidine, Titanium Dioxide, Glycolic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract.
